Sub InsertParagraphNumber2 rem ---------------------------------------------------------------------- rem define variables dim document as object dim dispatcher as object rem ---------------------------------------------------------------------- rem get access to the document document = ThisComponent.CurrentController.Frame dispatcher = createUnoService("com.sun.star.frame.DispatchHelper") rem ---------------------------------------------------------------------- dim args1(0) as new com.sun.star.beans.PropertyValue args1(0).Name = "Select" args1(0).Value = false dispatcher.executeDispatch(document, ".uno:gotoStartOfParagraph", "", 0, args1()) rem ---------------------------------------------------------------------- dim args2(5) as new com.sun.star.beans.PropertyValue args2(0).Name = "Type" args2(0).Value = 23 args2(1).Name = "SubType" args2(1).Value = 9 args2(2).Name = "Name" args2(2).Value = "Параграф" args2(3).Name = "Content" args2(3).Value = "Параграф+1" args2(4).Name = "Format" args2(4).Value = 4 args2(5).Name = "Separator" args2(5).Value = "." dispatcher.executeDispatch(document, ".uno:InsertField", "", 0, args2()) End Sub
